Package com.gsm.service

Class SaleOrderServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.SaleOrderServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SaleOrderService
    @Service
public class SaleOrderServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SaleOrderService
    The concrete implementation of the SaleOrderService interface. Handles all business logic for Sale Orders, including the complex pivoting/un-pivoting of order details.

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public SaleOrderDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a single sale order by its unique identifier, with full details.

        Use Case: Called when a user clicks to view or edit an existing sale order's details.

        Specified by:
        findById in interface SaleOrderService
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the sale order to find.
        Returns:

      • search

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<SaleOrderDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches for sale orders based on a keyword.

        Use Case: Called from the list page when the user enters a term in the search box.

        Specified by:
        search in interface SaleOrderService
        Parameters:
        keyword - The term to search for (e.g., in sale order number or customer name).
        Returns:
        A list of SaleOrderDtos that match the keyword.

      • deleteByIds

        @Transactional
public void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
        Deletes one or more sale orders based on a list of IDs.

        REFACTORED: This method was changed to iterate through IDs to ensure safe deletion of child entities (e.g., SaleOrderDetail) before deleting the parent SaleOrder. The previous `deleteAllById` was unsafe and could cause foreign key constraint violations.

        Specified by:
        deleteByIds in interface SaleOrderService
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of sale order IDs to be deleted.

      • findBySaleOrderNo

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public SaleOrderDto findBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        Finds a single sale order by its unique sale order number.

        Use Case: Primarily used by APIs to quickly fetch an order's existence or basic info without loading all its details.

        Specified by:
        findBySaleOrderNo in interface SaleOrderService
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The unique number of the sale order.
        Returns:
        The SaleOrderDto (simplified version) matching the number.
